thread.title: Japan orders checks on cryptocurrency after $530 million heist

title: Japan orders checks on cryptocurrency after $530 million heist
text:
Japan orders checks on cryptocurrency after $530 million heist Monday, January 29, 2018 - 01:36 
Tokyo-based cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck has until February 13 to explain to the Japanese government how hackers stole $530 million worth of digital coins. Rosanna Philpott reports.   
Tokyo-based cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck has until February 13 to explain to the Japanese government how hackers stole $530 million worth of digital coins. Rosanna Philpott reports.  //reut.rs/2nm9ibg
